name: Mom Never Stops Being Noisy!
description:
"Stop being so naughty!"

Sometimes you just be that kid who is tired of your Mom's nagging!

Mom Never Stops being Noisy is an annoying-comedy game - about Mother and Kid's relationship. This game is made to annoy and entertain you, so please don't take this game too seriously. The game was made as a part of Mojiken Camp 2022, the internship program at Mojiken Studio in two weeks' time. 

Feedback is appreciated and have fun playing the game!

Game Controls 
  • Mouse to aim
  • Left Click to shoot/continue
  • Don't spam the bullet!
